answerText: Mission Impossible: Ghost Protocol [prompt on "Mission Impossible"][10] This antagonist in Ghost Protocol bombed the Kremlin to get Russian nuclear launch codes in order to start a global nuclear war. This Swedish-Russian nuclear physicist thinks this will make humanity stronger.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 7 | 14 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question:  In this movie, Simon Pegg plays the role of a newly promoted field agent. For 10 points each: [10] Name this recent movie that features a scene of Tom Cruise character scaling the Burj Khalifa. The title "protocol" labels the IMF as rogue, but allows them to track down their enemies.
